alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Hamilton; Wabash; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 12:08PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern White, eastern Wayne, Wabash, Edwards, northern Hamilton, central Gibson and north central Posey Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1208 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Schnell to near Fairfield to 9 miles northwest of Mcleansboro. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Salem around 1225 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lancaster, Albion, Grayville, Mount Carmel, Princeton and Patoka. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 12. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 96 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for south central and southeastern Illinois...and southwestern Indiana.
